headline: Humanities Grants To Fund 188 Programs
abstract: This round of funding totals $30.9 million and will support 188 projects across the country.
lead_paragraph: An on-site augmented reality tour addressing the 1970 Kent State University shootings, a database that will allow users to search a painting collection by pigment, digital course modules on Floridaâ€™s African-American history and a digital anthology of almost 300 hymn melodies published in the United States before 1861 are among the 188 recipients of new grants from the National Endowment for the Humanities.
